text: 1. Daylight savings gives me life because it’s just SO bright and light and wonderful! Having light in our kitchen so late has been game changing. Waking up from winter! 2. Sort of want to make lucky charms ice cream! 3. Definitely had a dream that there were tarantulas in my house which led me to wake up googling which states they live in. 4. What happens when we buy things we don’t need. 5. Give me an update on your favorite true crime podcasts! 6. TV things!! I started rewatching Dawson’s Creek and Eddie watched some episodes with me… it was hilarious. We’re also all caught up on 1923 and the White Lotus! 7. Slow decluttering is a thing. 8. I got an oura ring and I am obsessed. Never thought I would be.
html:
1. Daylight savings gives me life because it’s just SO bright and light and wonderful! Having light in our kitchen so late has been game changing. Waking up from winter!

2. Sort of want to make lucky charms ice cream!

3. Definitely had a dream that there were tarantulas in my house which led me to wake up googling which states they live in.

4. What happens when we buy things we don’t need.

5. Give me an update on your favorite true crime podcasts!

6. TV things!! I started rewatching Dawson’s Creek and Eddie watched some episodes with me… it was hilarious. We’re also all caught up on 1923 and the White Lotus!

7. Slow decluttering is a thing.

8. I got an oura ring and I am obsessed. Never thought I would be.
